colophon_text_read: تمام شد كتاب الهى [نامه] شيخ فريد الدين عطار رضوان الله و حسن [?]
notes: Multi-text codex (465 pages). Ilahinama by Fariduddin Attar occupies folios 38b-111b. Text ends on right page of digitized page 115 (folio 111b) with completion formula 'tamam shud kitab ilahi-nama shaykh fariduddin attar ridwan allah wa husn [?]' -- names only the author, not a scribe. No scribal colophon found. Gold-flecked pink paper, 4-column nastaaliq with hikayat section headers. Some gold-leaf damage obscures portions of text on final page. The next text in the codex begins on page 116 right with a new illuminated headpiece. Option 4 candidate -- no evidence of Khandan attribution found in the colophon area of this specific text.
